name.str: Fazbear Entertainment Maintenance and Repair Manual
name.str_pl: copies of Fazbear Entertainment Maintenance and Repair Manual

description: A hefty binder with laminated sheets, detailing reprogramming and maintenance of animatronic endoskeletons and their 'characters'.  Jeez, looks like this hasn't even been opened since it was bound.  This might explain a few things.

//: oi feck off from my memoirs ya cunt
description: A well-worn and slightly bloody notebook with a small Australian flag sticker on the front.  You feel uneasy holding it.  Even a cursory glance at the contents fills you with existential horror and deep-seated disgust, but it may have some unforseen insight into...  Creative manipulation of formative-age organic tissue in conjunction with bionics...?
//: todo: this one will have recipes for reactivating/reprogramming special bots. Brotip: collect some child zombie corpses. also todo: make this one copy per save somehow
